Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Centara Watergate Pavillion Hotel Bangkok, you'll be centrally located in Bangkok, steps from Pratunam Market and Platinum Fashion Mall. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Trimurti Shrine and Ganesha Shrine.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 281 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages and facials. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Bangkok? This hotel has 1937 square feet (180 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. RV/bus/truck parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Treat yourself with massages and facials. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

With a stay at Centara Watergate Pavillion Hotel Bangkok, you'll be centrally located in Bangkok, steps from Pratunam Market and Platinum Fashion Mall. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Trimurti Shrine and Ganesha Shrine.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pratunam Market - 0 km / 0 mi
Platinum Fashion Mall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Trimurti Shrine - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Ganesha Shrine - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Pantip Plaza - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
CentralWorld Shopping Complex - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Gaysorn Plaza - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Erawan Mall - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Amarin Plaza - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Erawan Shrine - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Suan Pakkard Palace - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Central Chidlom Department Store - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Police General Hospital - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Siam Paragon Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Siam Ocean World - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Bangkok (DMK-Don Mueang Intl.) - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi
Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 23.6 km / 14.7 mi

The preferred airport for Centara Watergate Pavillion Hotel Bangkok is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Room 1

Notice
With bookings that include children, please note that the children may be accommodated in the existing bedding and not in separate beds. An extra bed can often be provided at an extra charge pre travel or locally if required.


-Check-in time is 3 p.m. Check-out time is 12 noon on the day of departure.


Please note that the Chili Hip Rooftop Restaurant is permanently closed from 01st January 2018. The restaurant will offer for private functions or corporate events group reservations only. We provide a variety of menu options at different price points to meet your budget requirements. However, the other outlets will open as normal. Caf 9, opening from 06.00 hrs. to 23.00 hrs.WALK Rooftop Bar, opening from 17.00 hrs. to 01.00 hrs.


Effective Thursday 1st February 2018, Thailand has imposed a total smoking ban on 24 popular beaches across the country as part of its sustainable tourism drive. The major beaches include high volume destinations such as Phuket, Samui, Krabi, Hua Hin and Koh Phi Phi. Visitors who do smoke will still be accommodated in designated smoking areas. Clients who use e-cigarettes should be aware that personal possession of e-cigarettes in Thailand is illegal
